definitions.definition: To converse or debate concerning a particular topic.
examples: Let's sit down and discuss whether we should have a baby.
I don't wish to discuss this further.

definitions.definition: To communicate , tell , or disclose (information, a message, etc.).
To break to pieces; to shatter.
To deal with, in eating or drinking; consume .
To examine or search thoroughly; to exhaust a remedy against, as against a principal debtor before proceeding against the surety .
To drive away , disperse , shake off; said especially of tumors .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To converse or debate concerning a particular topic.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , obsolete ) To communicate , tell , or disclose (information, a message, etc.).
( obsolete , transitive ) To break to pieces; to shatter.
( obsolete , transitive , colloquial ) To deal with, in eating or drinking; consume .
( transitive , law ) To examine or search thoroughly; to exhaust a remedy against, as against a principal debtor before proceeding against the surety .
( obsolete , transitive ) To drive away , disperse , shake off; said especially of tumors .
